posts.title: Enemy pacing pass v1.6
posts.summary: Spawn timing was retuned, FX readability improved, and a new late-wave ammo drop rule was added.

posts.title: Route shuffle patch v2.1
posts.summary: Checkpoint spacing was smoothed and two bonus shortcut paths were added for advanced players.

posts.title: Co-op test build notes
posts.summary: Session join flow has been stabilized and player objective markers now sync correctly in test lobbies.
